title: What did Paul McCartney do to Linda? - Quora

response.answer_text: He married her and remained faithful to her for nearly 30 years. He fornicated with her. He made her pregnant multiple times. They had three children together Mary, Stella and James. He also adopted her daughter Heather. He put her in his post Beatles band Wings. He lived life with her. When she was diagnosed with cancer he stood by her and helped her fight to beat it. *edit: I inadvertently left this out. She didn't beat it and when she died he mourned: end of edit*. He worshipped her as his lifemate. I'm sorry there are only positives here, if you are looking for some dramatic story that he beat and abused her you certainly picked the wrong couple. In an imperfect world their love was probably as close to perfect as you're likely to find.

In recent years allegations of abuse and infidelity have surfaced which puts a dark cloud on their media projected perfect marriage. In Anthology, Paul described his marriage to Linda as “not idyll” and “volatile.” Ruth and Angie McCartney recordings in 1994 via Geoffrey Giuliano accused Paul of abusing Ruth, as well as his elderly father. Mills claimed she recorded Paul with “his knowledge” and he admitted abuse and infidelity. Peter Cox, who was a good friend of Linda’s recorded 18 tapes of Linda in which he claimed she was miserable in her marriage and wanted to leave Paul.
